zh-cn: 亚历山大三世·亚历山德罗维奇
亚历山大·亚历山德罗维奇·罗曼诺夫

birth_place.zh-cn: 俄罗斯帝国圣彼得堡亚历山大皇宫
birth_place.en: Alexander Palace, Saint Petersburg, Russian Empire

death_place.zh-cn: 俄罗斯帝国塔夫里切斯基省

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯帝国皇帝（1881年-1894年在位），被称为“和平缔造者”。其统治时期是俄罗斯帝国后期的繁荣时期。
description.en: Emperor of Russia (reigned 1881–1894), known as 'The Peacemaker'. His reign was a period of prosperity for the late Russian Empire.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯帝国皇帝，亚历山大三世之父，被民意党人刺杀身亡。
description.en: Emperor of Russia, father of Alexander III, who was assassinated by members of Narodnaya Volya.

description.zh-cn: 亚历山大三世的长子，俄罗斯帝国末代皇帝。
description.en: Eldest son of Alexander III, the last Emperor of Russia.

nodes.id: 玛丽亚·费奥多罗芙娜皇后 (丹麦的达格玛)

zh-cn: 玛丽亚·费奥多罗芙娜皇后 (丹麦的达格玛)
玛丽·苏菲·弗雷德里卡·达格玛

description.zh-cn: 丹麦公主，后成为俄罗斯帝国皇后，亚历山大三世的妻子。
description.en: A Danish princess who became Empress of Russia as the spouse of Alexander III.

nodes.id: 尼古拉·亚历山德罗维奇

zh-cn: 尼古拉·亚历山德罗维奇

description.zh-cn: 亚历山大二世的长子，亚历山大三世的兄长。因肺结核早逝。
description.en: Eldest son of Alexander II and elder brother of Alexander III. Died young from tuberculosis.

nodes.id: 黑森-达姆施塔特的玛丽

zh-cn: 黑森-达姆施塔特的玛丽
玛克西米莲妮·威廉明妮·奥古斯塔·苏菲·玛丽公主
en: Marie of Hesse and by Rhine

description.zh-cn: 黑森-达姆施塔特公主，亚历山大二世的妻子，亚历山大三世的母亲。
description.en: Princess of Hesse and by Rhine, spouse of Alexander II and mother of Alexander III.

description.zh-cn: 19世纪俄罗斯的革命民粹主义组织，主张通过恐怖主义活动进行政治斗争。
description.en: A 19th-century revolutionary populist organization in Russia that advocated for political struggle through terrorist activities.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯革命家，列宁的胞兄。因参与策划刺杀沙皇亚历山大三世而被绞死。
description.en: Russian revolutionary, elder brother of Vladimir Lenin. He was executed for his part in the plot to assassinate Tsar Alexander III.

nodes.id: 弗拉基米尔·伊里奇·列宁

zh-cn: 弗拉基米尔·伊里奇·列宁
弗拉基米尔·乌里扬诺夫

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯革命家、政治家、理论家，苏联的主要缔造者。其兄亚历山大·乌里扬诺夫因刺杀沙皇被处决。
description.en: Russian revolutionary, politician, and political theorist, the principal founder of the Soviet Union. His brother, Aleksandr Ulyanov, was executed for an assassination attempt on the Tsar.

description.zh-cn: 1721年至1917年间存在的一个帝国，横跨欧亚大陆。
description.en: An empire that existed from 1721 to 1917, extending across Eurasia.

description.zh-cn: 1888年10月，沙皇亚历山大三世的御用列车在哈尔科夫附近出轨。此事件被认为是导致他健康恶化并最终去世的原因之一。
description.en: In October 1888, Tsar Alexander III's imperial train derailed near Kharkiv. The incident is considered a contributing factor to the deterioration of his health and eventual death.

description.zh-cn: 1871年至1918年间的德意志民族国家。
description.en: The German nation-state that existed from 1871 to 1918.

description.zh-cn: 普鲁士王国首相、德意志帝国第一任总理，亚历山大三世对其产生反感。
description.en: Minister President of Prussia and the first Chancellor of the German Empire, towards whom Alexander III developed an aversion.

description.zh-cn: 普鲁士国王及德意志帝国第一任皇帝，亚历山大三世对其产生反感。
description.en: King of Prussia and the first German Emperor, towards whom Alexander III developed an aversion.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲国家，在亚历山大三世统治后期与俄罗斯帝国关系密切。
description.en: A European country that developed a close relationship with the Russian Empire during the later reign of Alexander III.

description.zh-cn: 法国与俄罗斯帝国于1892年缔结的军事协定。
description.en: A military agreement concluded between France and the Russian Empire in 1892.

description.zh-cn: 位于法国巴黎的一座桥梁，为纪念法俄同盟而修建。
description.en: A bridge in Paris, France, built to commemorate the Franco-Russian Alliance.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯城市，亚历山大三世的出生地。
description.en: A Russian city, the birthplace of Alexander III.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯帝国皇帝，亚历山大二世之父，亚历山大三世的祖父。
description.en: Emperor of Russia, father of Alexander II and grandfather of Alexander III.

zh-cn: 亚历山德拉·费奥多罗芙娜

description.zh-cn: 普鲁士公主，嫁给尼古拉一世后成为俄罗斯皇后。亚历山大二世之母，亚历山大三世的祖母。
description.en: A Prussian princess who became Empress of Russia after marrying Nicholas I. She was the mother of Alexander II and the grandmother of Alexander III.

description.zh-cn: 亚历山大三世是亚历山大二世的次子。
description.en: Alexander III was the second son of Alexander II.

relationships.target: 黑森-达姆施塔特的玛丽

description.zh-cn: 亚历山大三世是黑森-达姆施塔特的玛丽的儿子。
description.en: Alexander III was the son of Marie of Hesse and by Rhine.

description.zh-cn: 亚历山大二世是尼古拉一世的儿子。
description.en: Alexander II was the son of Nicholas I.

description.zh-cn: 亚历山大二世是普鲁士的夏洛特的儿子。
description.en: Alexander II was the son of Charlotte of Prussia.

relationships.target: 尼古拉·亚历山德罗维奇

description.zh-cn: 亚历山大三世是皇储尼古拉·亚历山德罗维奇的弟弟，在其兄去世后成为皇储。
description.en: Alexander III was the younger brother of Tsarevich Nicholas Alexandrovich and became the heir apparent after his brother's death.

relationships.target: 玛丽亚·费奥多罗芙娜皇后 (丹麦的达格玛)

description.zh-cn: 亚历山大三世与丹麦的达格玛公主于1866年结婚。
description.en: Alexander III married Princess Dagmar of Denmark in 1866.

description.zh-cn: 尼古拉二世是亚历山大三世的长子和继承人。
description.en: Nicholas II was the eldest son and successor of Alexander III.

description.zh-cn: 民意党成员通过炸弹袭击成功刺杀了沙皇亚历山大二世。
description.en: Members of Narodnaya Volya successfully assassinated Tsar Alexander II in a bomb attack.

description.zh-cn: 在父亲亚历山大二世被刺杀后，亚历山大三世继位为俄罗斯帝国皇帝。
description.en: After the assassination of his father Alexander II, Alexander III ascended the throne as the Emperor of the Russian Empire.

relationships.source: 玛丽亚·费奥多罗芙娜皇后 (丹麦的达格玛)

description.zh-cn: 在其丹麦妻子玛丽亚·费奥多罗芙娜的影响下，亚历山大三世对德意志帝国及其领导人产生反感。
description.en: Under the influence of his Danish wife, Maria Feodorovna, Alexander III developed an aversion to the German Empire and its leaders.

description.zh-cn: 亚历山大三世对德意志帝国产生反感。
description.en: Alexander III developed an aversion to the German Empire.

description.zh-cn: 亚历山大三世对德国总理俾斯麦产生反感。
description.en: Alexander III developed an aversion to the German Chancellor Bismarck.

description.zh-cn: 1880年代末，因与德国关系恶化，亚历山大三世领导下的俄罗斯帝国开始亲近法国。
description.en: In the late 1880s, due to deteriorating relations with Germany, the Russian Empire under Alexander III began to align with France.

description.zh-cn: 民意党人曾计划于1887年3月1日行刺亚历山大三世，但计划败露，所有刺客均被逮捕。
description.en: Members of Narodnaya Volya planned to assassinate Alexander III on March 1, 1887, but the plot was uncovered and all assassins were arrested.

description.zh-cn: 作为对参与刺杀沙皇计划的惩罚，包括亚历山大·乌里扬诺夫在内的五名拒绝忏悔的民意党人被判处绞刑。
description.en: As punishment for participating in the assassination plot, five unrepentant members of Narodnaya Volya, including Aleksandr Ulyanov, were sentenced to be hanged.

relationships.target: 弗拉基米尔·伊里奇·列宁

description.zh-cn: 亚历山大·乌里扬诺夫是弗拉基米尔·伊里奇·列宁（原名弗拉基米尔·乌里扬诺夫）的胞兄。
description.en: Aleksandr Ulyanov was the elder brother of Vladimir Lenin (born Vladimir Ulyanov).

description.zh-cn: 1888年的波尔基铁路事故给亚历山大三世造成了心理和生理创伤，被认为是导致其健康恶化并最终因肾炎去世的诱因。
description.en: The Borki train disaster in 1888 caused psychological and physical trauma to Alexander III, and is considered a contributing factor to his deteriorating health and eventual death from nephritis.

description.zh-cn: 巴黎的亚历山大三世桥是为了纪念法国和俄罗斯缔结法俄同盟而修建的。
description.en: The Pont Alexandre III in Paris was built to commemorate the conclusion of the Franco-Russian Alliance between France and Russia.

description.zh-cn: 亚历山大三世于1845年3月10日出生于圣彼得堡冬宫。
description.en: Alexander III was born on March 10, 1845, in the Winter Palace in Saint Petersburg.
